# interest_calcs


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

> Just bundling up all interest calc related scripts/functions Iâ€™ve used
> at TH

[Documentation](https://pyronone.github.io/interest_calcs/index.html)

## Installation

    !git clone https://github.com/pyronone/interest_calcs.git
    %cd './interest_calcs'
    !pip install -e ".[dev]"

## Quick Example

``` python
from interest_calcs import srs_pv

pv, work, rf = srs_pv.pv_calc(
    int_rate_input=2.3,
    num_periods=40,
    amt_inputs=[(74.00, "1-may-2020"), (80.58, "1-may-2021")],  # amts change
)
pv
```

    3028.87

``` python
work
```
